column4: Hi, does anybody know whether pulseaudio suppose to run in system mode or in a gnome-session?

the preferred way of doing things is to launch it using gnome. If you have the esound compatibility package installed you can get gnome to launch it by making sure 'system sounds' are turned on in system > Preferences > sound
the pulseaudio-esound-compat is installed and play system sound is ticked. nevertheless pulsaudio is not running: ps aux | grep pulse.
thanks for the help, I found my issue it was: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/pulseaudio/+bug/189060. Now it works!!!
